snippet: A statement explaining the court’s remit came after growing pressure to open an inquiry into human rights abuses in territory controlled by the Islamic State.
lead_paragraph: A statement explaining the court’s remit came after growing pressure to open an inquiry into human rights abuses in territory controlled by the Islamic State.

headline.main: International Criminal Court Says ISIS Is Out of Its Jurisdiction
